	var content = current.u_content;
	var currentsysid = current.sys_id;
	var contentparsed = JSON.parse(content);
	var sd = contentparsed.sd;
	var desc = contentparsed.desc;
	
	var newinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
	newinc.initialize();
	newinc.short_description = sd;
	newinc.description = desc;
	newinc.insert();
	
	newincsysid = newinc.sys_id;
	
	current.u_incident = newincsysid;
	current.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 09:59:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a63512811b72a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb43</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration Create Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a63512811b72a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb43</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 17:35:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a63512811b72a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb43"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_869c0de21bba6810cdc7fc86cc4bcb8b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_push_integration_entries</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_push_integration_entries">sys_created_by=apiuser^u_call_type=Update^ORu_call_type=Create^u_sent_or_received=received^EQ<item endquery="false" field="sys_created_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="apiuser"/><item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Update"/><item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="Create"/><item endquery="false" field="u_sent_or_received" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="received"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration Urgency Impact Handling</name><order>19</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var setLocalUrgency = "none";
    var setLocalImpact = "none";

    // Map Remote Urgency to Local Urgency
    function urgencymap(remoteurgency) {
        if (remoteurgency == '1 - High')
            setLocalUrgency = 'HIGH';
        if (remoteurgency == '2 - Medium')
            setLocalUrgency = 'MEDIUM';
        if (remoteurgency == '3 - Low')
            setLocalUrgency = 'LOW';
    }

    // Map Remote Impact to Local Impact
    function impactmap(remoteimpact) {
        if (remoteimpact == '1 - High')
            setLocalImpact = 'HIGH';
        if (remoteimpact == '2 - Medium')
            setLocalImpact = 'MEDIUM';
        if (remoteimpact == '3 - Low')
            setLocalImpact = 'LOW';
    }



    // Parse the Entry
    var content = current.u_content;
    var currentsysid = current.sys_id;
    var contentparsed = JSON.parse(content);

    // Get The Relevant Incident SYSID
    var incsysid = current.u_incident;

    // Grab the relevant Incident Record
    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);


    var remote_urgency = contentparsed.urgency;
    var remote_impact = contentparsed.impact;


    urgencymap(remote_urgency);
    impactmap(remote_impact);
    if (setLocalUrgency != 'none') {
        thisinc.urgency.setDisplayValue(setLocalUrgency);
    }
    if (setLocalImpact != 'none') {
        thisinc.impact.setDisplayValue(setLocalImpact);
    }


    thisinc.update();





})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-12 20:12:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>869c0de21bba6810cdc7fc86cc4bcb8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration Urgency Impact Handling</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_869c0de21bba6810cdc7fc86cc4bcb8b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 20:24:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=869c0de21bba6810cdc7fc86cc4bcb8b"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">u_ticket_integration=ATSG^sys_updated_by!=apiuser^EQ<item display_value="ATSG" endquery="false" field="u_ticket_integration" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="ATSG"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_updated_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="apiuser"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Inc Update Trigger</name><order>150</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
	
	var targeturl = 'https://atsgdev.service-now.com/';
	var endpoint = 'atsg/atsg_push_integration/incident/update';
	
    var createentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
    createentry.initialize();
    createentry.u_incident = current.sys_id;
    createentry.u_call_type = "Update";
	createentry.u_integration_type = "Incident";
	createentry.u_call_method = "POST";
	createentry.u_sent_or_received = "sent";
	createentry.u_target_url = targeturl;
	createentry.u_api_endpoint = endpoint;
	createentry.insert();





})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 13:48:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3d5e47091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Inc Update Trigger</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3d5e47091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 17:07:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3d5e47091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb98"/></record_update>

    var targeturl = 'https://atsgdev.service-now.com/';
    var endpoint = 'atsg/atsg_push_integration/incident/attachment';


    var lastattachment = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    lastattachment.setLimit(1);
    lastattachment.query();

    var thisattachment = "";
    if (lastattachment.next()) {
        thisattachment = lastattachment.sys_id;
    }


    var checkforattachment = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
    checkforattachment.addQuery('u_status_code', 200);
    checkforattachment.addQuery('u_attachment', thisattachment);
    checkforattachment.query();

    if (checkforattachment.getRowCount() == 0) {


        var createentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
        createentry.initialize();
        createentry.u_incident = current.sys_id;
        createentry.u_call_type = "Attachment";
        createentry.u_integration_type = "Incident";
        createentry.u_call_method = "POST";
        createentry.u_sent_or_received = "sent";
        createentry.u_target_url = targeturl;
        createentry.u_api_endpoint = endpoint;
		createentry.u_attachment = thisattachment;
        createentry.insert();


    }




})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 13:53:23</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bb5f4f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb06</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Inc Attach Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bb5f4f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb06</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 17:06:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bb5f4f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb06"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1c7a570d1bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb9b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_push_integration_entries</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_push_integration_entries">u_call_type=Update^u_sent_or_received=sent^sys_created_by!=apiuser^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Update"/><item endquery="false" field="u_sent_or_received" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="sent"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_created_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="apiuser"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Update Inc Send</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    //////////////////////////////////
    //Modify to match environment
    var basicauthconfigname = 'azia';

    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////	
    var auth = new GlideRecord('sys_auth_profile_basic');
    auth.addQuery('name', basicauthconfigname);
    auth.query();

    var creds = "";
    if (auth.next()) {
        creds = auth.sys_id;
    }
    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////


    var incsysid = current.u_incident;
	var external_inc_sys_id = current.u_external_inc_sysid;
    var thisentrysysid = current.sys_id;
	
	var targeturl = current.u_target_url;
    var endpoint = current.u_api_endpoint;
    var fullurl = targeturl + endpoint + "?inc_sys_id=" + external_inc_sys_id;
	
	

    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);



    // Create Empty Object to populate later
    var contentobj = {};

    // Set variables to Capture
    var description = thisinc.description;
    var short_description = thisinc.short_description;
    var impact = thisinc.impact;
    var urgency = thisinc.urgency;
    var category = thisinc.category;
    var subcategory = thisinc.subcategory;
    var caller = thisinc.getDisplayValue('caller_id');
	var state = thisinc.getDisplayValue('state');
	var closecode = thisinc.getDisplayValue('close_code');
	var closenotes = thisinc.getValue('close_notes');

    //Set Critical Values
	contentobj.u_external_inc_number = current.getDisplayValue('u_incident');
    contentobj.u_external_inc_sysid = current.getValue('u_incident');
    contentobj.description = description;
    contentobj.short_description = short_description;

    // Optional on creation
    contentobj.caller = caller;
    contentobj.impact = impact;
    contentobj.urgency = urgency;
    contentobj.subcategory = subcategory;
    contentobj.category = category;
	
	// State Information
	contentobj.state = state;
	contentobj.close_code = closecode;
	contentobj.close_notes = closenotes;
	
	

	
    //// Convert Content Object to JSON String
    var contentstr = JSON.stringify(contentobj);
    current.u_content = contentstr;
    current.update();

	
	
	
	
	
	
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    var update_inc_request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    update_inc_request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    update_inc_request.setEndpoint(fullurl);
    update_inc_request.setAuthenticationProfile('basic', creds);
    update_inc_request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    update_inc_request.setRequestBody(contentstr);


    var update_inc_response = update_inc_request.execute();
    var update_inc_httpResponseStatus = update_inc_response.getStatusCode();
    var update_inc_responsebody = update_inc_response.getBody();
	
	var parsedresponse = JSON.parse(update_inc_responsebody);
	parsedupdatetime = new GlideDateTime(parsedresponse.result.incident_last_updated_on);
	
	var thisentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
	thisentry.get(thisentrysysid);
	
	thisentry.u_responsebody = update_inc_responsebody;
	thisentry.u_status_code = update_inc_httpResponseStatus;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_sysid = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisentry.update();
	
	
	
	
	/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////
	//////////////////////////
	/// Modify name of field to match local
	thisinc.u_client_inc_sys_id = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisinc.u_client_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisinc.u_client_inc_last_updated_on = parsedupdatetime;
	thisinc.update();






})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 14:41:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1c7a570d1bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb9b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Update Inc Send</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1c7a570d1bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb9b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 20:04:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1c7a570d1bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcb9b"/></record_update>

    var setLocalState = "none";
    var setCloseNoteCloseCode = "no";
    var setLocalCloseCode = "none";

    // Map States Remote Integrated States that should trigger Local Change
    function statemap(remotestate) {
        if (remotestate == 'Resolved')
            setLocalState = 'Resolved';
        setCloseNoteCloseCode = "yes";
        if (remotestate == 'Canceled')
            setLocalState = 'Canceled';
    }
	
	// Map the Close Codes
    function close_code_map(remote_close_code) {
		
        if (remote_close_code == 'Not Solved (Too Costly)')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Not Solved (Too Costly)';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Not Solved (Not Reproducible)')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Not Solved (Not Reproducible)';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Closed/Resolved by Caller')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Closed/Resolved by Caller';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Solved Remotely (Permanently)')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Solved Remotely (Permanently)';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Solved Remotely (Work Around)')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Solved Remotely (Work Around)';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Solved (Work Around)')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Solved (Work Around)';
        if (remote_close_code == 'Solved (Permanently))')
            setLocalCloseCode = 'Solved (Permanently)';

    }



    // Parse the Entry
    var content = current.u_content;
    var currentsysid = current.sys_id;
    var contentparsed = JSON.parse(content);

    // Get The Relevant Incident SYSID
    var incsysid = current.u_incident;

    // Grab the relevant Incident Record
    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);


    var state = contentparsed.state;
    var remote_close_code = contentparsed.close_code;
    var remote_close_notes = contentparsed.close_notes;


    statemap(state);
    if (setLocalState != 'none') {
        thisinc.state.setDisplayValue(setLocalState);
    }
    if (setCloseNoteCloseCode == 'yes') {
		close_code_map(remote_close_code);
		thisinc.close_code.setDisplayValue(setLocalCloseCode);
		thisinc.close_notes = remote_close_notes;
    }


    thisinc.update();





})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 18:32:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>104fccdd1b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbe2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration State Handling</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_104fccdd1b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbe2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 20:03:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=104fccdd1b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbe2"/></record_update>

    // Parse the Entry
    var content = current.u_content;
    var currentsysid = current.sys_id;
    var contentparsed = JSON.parse(content);

    // Get The Relevant Incident SYSID
    var incsysid = current.u_incident;

    // Grab the relevant Incident Record
    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);

    var comments = contentparsed.comments;
    var work_notes = contentparsed.work_notes;
	
	var state = contentparsed.state;
	var close_code = contentparsed.close_code;
	var close_notes = contentparsed.close_notes;

    //If comments exist and are not null, set the comments field
    if (JSUtil.has(comments)) {
        thisinc.comments = comments.user + " COMMENT: "+ "\n\n" + comments.value;
    }

    //If work_notes exist and are not null, set the comments field
    if (JSUtil.has(work_notes)) {
        thisinc.work_notes = work_notes.user + " WORKNOTE"+ "\n\n" + work_notes.value;
    }

	/////////////////////////////////////////////
	///// Custom addition area //////////////////
	
	
	
	
	
	/////////////////////////////////////////////
	
	thisinc.update();
	
	



})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 11:44:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a6e1fec11bb2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration Update Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a6e1fec11bb2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 16:57:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a6e1fec11bb2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_99acc0ea1bf66810cdc7fc86cc4bcb58
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_push_integration_entries</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_push_integration_entries">u_call_type=Journal^u_sent_or_received=sent^sys_created_by!=apiuser^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Journal"/><item endquery="false" field="u_sent_or_received" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="sent"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_created_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="apiuser"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Journal Inc Send</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    //////////////////////////////////
    //Modify to match environment
    var basicauthconfigname = 'azia';

    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////	
    var auth = new GlideRecord('sys_auth_profile_basic');
    auth.addQuery('name', basicauthconfigname);
    auth.query();

    var creds = "";
    if (auth.next()) {
        creds = auth.sys_id;
    }
    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////


    var incsysid = current.u_incident;
	var external_inc_sys_id = current.u_external_inc_sysid;
    var thisentrysysid = current.sys_id;
	
	var targeturl = current.u_target_url;
    var endpoint = current.u_api_endpoint;
    var fullurl = targeturl + endpoint + "?inc_sys_id=" + external_inc_sys_id;
	
	

    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);



    // Create Empty Object to populate later
    var contentobj = {};



    //Set Critical Values
	contentobj.u_external_inc_number = current.getDisplayValue('u_incident');
    contentobj.u_external_inc_sysid = current.getValue('u_incident');



	
	
	////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
	var latestjournal = new GlideRecord('sys_journal_field');
	latestjournal.addQuery('element_id',incsysid);
	var ljOr = latestjournal.addQuery('element', 'comments');
	ljOr.addOrCondition('element', 'work_notes');
	latestjournal.setLimit(1);
	latestjournal.query();
	
	var thisjournalsysid = "";
	var thisjournalcreatedby = "";
	var thisjournalvalue = "";
	var thisjournalcreatedon = "";
	var thisjournalelement = "";
	
	if(latestjournal.next()){
		thisjournalsysid = latestjournal.sys_id;
		thisjournalcreatedby = latestjournal.getDisplayValue('sys_created_by');
		thisjournalvalue = latestjournal.value;
		thisjournalcreatedon = latestjournal.sys_created_on;
		thisjournalelement = latestjournal.element;
	}
	
	var journalobj = {};
	
	var journalidcheck = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
	journalidcheck.addQuery('u_journal',thisjournalsysid);
	journalidcheck.query();
	if(journalidcheck.getRowCount() == 0){
		journalobj.user = thisjournalcreatedby;
		journalobj.value = thisjournalvalue;
		journalobj.createdon = thisjournalcreatedon;
		journalobj.element = thisjournalelement;
		if (thisjournalelement == 'comments'){
			contentobj.comments = journalobj;
		}
		if (thisjournalelement == 'work_notes'){
			contentobj.work_notes = journalobj;
		}
		current.u_journal = thisjournalsysid;
	}
	
	
    //// Convert Content Object to JSON String
    var contentstr = JSON.stringify(contentobj);
    current.u_content = contentstr;
    current.update();

	
	
	
	
	
	
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    var update_inc_request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    update_inc_request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    update_inc_request.setEndpoint(fullurl);
    update_inc_request.setAuthenticationProfile('basic', creds);
    update_inc_request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    update_inc_request.setRequestBody(contentstr);


    var update_inc_response = update_inc_request.execute();
    var update_inc_httpResponseStatus = update_inc_response.getStatusCode();
    var update_inc_responsebody = update_inc_response.getBody();
	
	var parsedresponse = JSON.parse(update_inc_responsebody);
	parsedupdatetime = new GlideDateTime(parsedresponse.result.incident_last_updated_on);
	
	var thisentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
	thisentry.get(thisentrysysid);
	
	thisentry.u_responsebody = update_inc_responsebody;
	thisentry.u_status_code = update_inc_httpResponseStatus;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_sysid = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisentry.update();
	
	
	
	
	/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////
	//////////////////////////
	/// Modify name of field to match local
	thisinc.u_client_inc_sys_id = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisinc.u_client_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisinc.u_client_inc_last_updated_on = parsedupdatetime;
	thisinc.update();

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">u_ticket_integration=ATSG^EQ<item display_value="ATSG" endquery="false" field="u_ticket_integration" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="ATSG"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Inc Attach Check</name><order>170</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {


    var targeturl = 'https://atsgdev.service-now.com/';
    var endpoint = 'atsg/atsg_push_integration/incident/attachment';


    var lastattachment = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    lastattachment.setLimit(1);
    lastattachment.query();

    var thisattachment = "";
    if (lastattachment.next()) {
        thisattachment = lastattachment.sys_id;
    }


    var checkforattachment = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
    checkforattachment.addQuery('u_status_code', 200);
    checkforattachment.addQuery('u_attachment', thisattachment);
    checkforattachment.query();

    if (checkforattachment.getRowCount() == 0) {


        var createentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
        createentry.initialize();
        createentry.u_incident = current.sys_id;
        createentry.u_call_type = "Attachment";
        createentry.u_integration_type = "Incident";
        createentry.u_call_method = "POST";
        createentry.u_sent_or_received = "sent";
        createentry.u_target_url = targeturl;
        createentry.u_api_endpoint = endpoint;
		createentry.u_attachment = thisattachment;
        createentry.insert();


    }




})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 17:05:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a64bb7051b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbb8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Inc Attach Check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a64bb7051b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbb8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 17:05:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a64bb7051b76a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbb8"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_push_integration_entries</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_push_integration_entries">u_call_type=Create^u_sent_or_received=sent^sys_created_by!=apiuser^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Create"/><item endquery="false" field="u_sent_or_received" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="sent"/><item endquery="false" field="sys_created_by" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="apiuser"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Create Inc Send</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    //////////////////////////////////
    //Modify to match environment
    var basicauthconfigname = 'azia';

    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////	
    var auth = new GlideRecord('sys_auth_profile_basic');
    auth.addQuery('name', basicauthconfigname);
    auth.query();

    var creds = "";
    if (auth.next()) {
        creds = auth.sys_id;
    }
    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////

    var targeturl = current.u_target_url;
    var endpoint = current.u_api_endpoint;
    var fullurl = targeturl + endpoint;
    var incsysid = current.u_incident;
    var thisentrysysid = current.sys_id;

    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);



    // Create Empty Object to populate later
    var contentobj = {};

    // Set variables to Capture
    var description = thisinc.description;
    var short_description = thisinc.short_description;
    var impact = thisinc.impact;
    var urgency = thisinc.urgency;
    var category = thisinc.category;
    var subcategory = thisinc.subcategory;
    var caller = thisinc.getDisplayValue('caller_id');

    //Set Critical Values
	contentobj.u_external_inc_number = current.getDisplayValue('u_incident');
    contentobj.u_external_inc_sysid = current.getValue('u_incident');
    contentobj.description = description;
    contentobj.short_description = short_description;

    // Optional on creation
    contentobj.caller = caller;
    contentobj.impact = impact;
    contentobj.urgency = urgency;
    contentobj.subcategory = subcategory;
    contentobj.category = category;


    //// Convert Content Object to JSON String
    var contentstr = JSON.stringify(contentobj);
    current.u_content = contentstr;
    current.update();

	
	
	
	
	
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    var create_inc_request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    create_inc_request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    create_inc_request.setEndpoint(fullurl);
    create_inc_request.setAuthenticationProfile('basic', creds);
    create_inc_request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    create_inc_request.setRequestBody(contentstr);


    var create_inc_response = create_inc_request.execute();
    var create_inc_httpResponseStatus = create_inc_response.getStatusCode();
    var create_inc_responsebody = create_inc_response.getBody();
	
	var parsedresponse = JSON.parse(create_inc_responsebody);

	var thisentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
	thisentry.get(thisentrysysid);
	
	thisentry.u_responsebody = create_inc_responsebody;
	thisentry.u_status_code = create_inc_httpResponseStatus;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_sysid = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisentry.u_external_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisentry.update();
	
	/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
	///////////////////////////////////////////////////
	//////////////////////////
	/// Modify name of field to match local
	thisinc.u_client_inc_sys_id = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
	thisinc.u_client_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
	thisinc.update();






})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 14:10:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>87331f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Create Inc Send</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_87331f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 15:23:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=87331f091bf2a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbc4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_push_integration_entries</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_push_integration_entries">u_call_type=Attachment^u_sent_or_received=sent^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_call_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Attachment"/><item endquery="false" field="u_sent_or_received" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="sent"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Push Integration - Attachment Inc Send</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    //////////////////////////////////
    //Modify to match environment
    var basicauthconfigname = 'azia';

    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////	
    var auth = new GlideRecord('sys_auth_profile_basic');
    auth.addQuery('name', basicauthconfigname);
    auth.query();

    var creds = "";
    if (auth.next()) {
        creds = auth.sys_id;
    }
    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////


    var incsysid = current.u_incident;
    var external_inc_sys_id = current.u_external_inc_sysid;
    var thisentrysysid = current.sys_id;

    var targeturl = current.u_target_url;
    var endpoint = current.u_api_endpoint;
    var fullurl = targeturl + endpoint + "?inc_sys_id=" + external_inc_sys_id;



    var thisinc = new GlideRecord('incident');
    thisinc.get(incsysid);


    var attachmentquery = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
    attachmentquery.addQuery('table_sys_id', atsgincsysid);
    attachmentquery.addQuery('table_name', 'incident');
    attachmentquery.addQuery('sys_id', attachmentsysid);
    attachmentquery.setLimit(1);
    attachmentquery.query();

    var thisattachmentsysid = "";
    var thiscontenttype = "";
    var thisfilename = "";
    var downloadattachment = "";
    var attachmentcontent = "";



    if (attachmentquery.next()) {

        thisattachmentsysid = attachmentquery.sys_id;
        thiscontenttype = attachmentquery.content_type.toString();
        thisfilename = encodeURIComponent(attachmentquery.file_name.toString());

        //gs.log("find the attachment? " + thisfilename)

        var attachmentsendurl = targeturl;
        attachmentsendurl += "api/now/attachment/file?";
        attachmentsendurl += "table_name=incident";
        attachmentsendurl += "&table_sys_id=" + external_inc_sys_id;
        attachmentsendurl += "&file_name=" + thisfilename;



        //gs.log("attachmenturl is " + attachmentsendurl)

        var attachmentrequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        attachmentrequest.setHttpMethod('post');
        attachmentrequest.setEndpoint(attachmentsendurl);
        attachmentrequest.setRequestBodyFromAttachment(thisattachmentsysid);
        attachmentrequest.setAuthenticationProfile('basic', creds);
        attachmentrequest.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', thiscontenttype);

        var attachmentresponse = attachmentrequest.execute();
        var attachmenthttpResponseStatus = attachmentresponse.getStatusCode();
        var attachmentresponsebody = attachmentresponse.getBody();
        //gs.log("attach status is" + attachmenthttpResponseStatus)


        var parsedattachmentresponse = JSON.parse(attachmentresponsebody);
        var parsedattachsysid = parsedattachmentresponse.result.sys_id;


    }






    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

    if (attachmenthttpResponseStatus == 200 || attachmenthttpResponseStatus == 201) {

        var contentobj = {};
        contentobj.u_attachment = parsedattachsysid;
        contentobj.u_external_inc_number = current.getDisplayValue('u_incident');
        contentobj.u_external_inc_sysid = current.getValue('u_incident');
        var contentstr = JSON.stringify(contentobj);

        var update_inc_request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        update_inc_request.setHttpMethod('POST');
        update_inc_request.setEndpoint(fullurl);
        update_inc_request.setAuthenticationProfile('basic', creds);
        update_inc_request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        update_inc_request.setRequestBody(contentstr);


        var update_inc_response = update_inc_request.execute();
        var update_inc_httpResponseStatus = update_inc_response.getStatusCode();
        var update_inc_responsebody = update_inc_response.getBody();

    }
    var parsedresponse = JSON.parse(update_inc_responsebody);


    var thisentry = new GlideRecord('u_push_integration_entries');
    thisentry.get(thisentrysysid);

    thisentry.u_responsebody = update_inc_responsebody;
    thisentry.u_status_code = update_inc_httpResponseStatus;
    thisentry.u_external_inc_sysid = parsedresponse.result.incident_id;
    thisentry.u_external_inc_number = parsedresponse.result.incident_number;
    thisentry.update();







})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>azia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 15:41:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>592863091b36a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbd4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push Integration - Attachment Inc Send</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_592863091b36a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbd4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>azia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 14:59:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=592863091b36a410cdc7fc86cc4bcbd4"/></record_update>
